pageContext.claim: “Well, that's all up to the Attorney General. Attorney General Barr is working on that. That's his department, not my department. But we have a very capable Attorney General. So that's really up to him. I'm not involved.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is trying to avoid accountability for the firing of the Manhattan U.S. Attorney. But Attorney General William Barr could only fire him with the express approval of the president.
